About Us

Café Stile

Café Stile is a coffee shop running by an italian man who wanted to create an unique experience where each waitress will treat you in a different way. So you can enjoy a good blend while you are attended in the way you prefer. Our blends use high quality organic coffee grains, we also have great pastry. If you want some main dishes we offer some good options like our iconic omurice. We'll waiting for you!
